title: Gift of Magic icon missing
body: I gifted Rakan to a friend while the promotion was still on and I still receive the notification that the gift has been opened whenever I log into League but have yet to receive the gift of magic icon. It has been more than 2 weeks so perhaps the system skipped me or something like that.

replies.body:
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/56082492.jpg
Went ahead an added it for you! Hope it brings you luck. :D
I have *just* received mine. Thank you to whomever just fixed it. <3
Hey, I also gifted Xayah to my friend who in turn gifted me back. Neither of us have received our icons yet, and it's been quite a while. Whens the last day for them to roll out?
